resources.string: Log file will export to /MIUI/Debug directory in SDcard
The theme is not readable, please select another.
"Sorry, program can't run on the current android version!"
This theme may not automatically fit your screen resolution, do you wish to go on?
MiLocker offers you ever-changing lockscreens including side slip, vertical slip, multiple-point unlocking, and even animation unlocking.
"MIUI has the world's leading lockscreen theme library as well as talented designer users. Whether you are a designer or a mobile user, nothing but your imagination limits you."
Press [Back] and [Volume+] at the same time to unlock if you could not unlock normally.
Only for devices which can be unlocked by clicking Home key (e.g. SGS2)
If pressing Home key unlocks directly, please perform the following two steps:
Clear current default setting for launcher
You’ve also installed other launchers, please select the launcher you will use after unlocking:
On the next interface, click Clear defaults button.
On the next interface, check Use by default for this action and select MiHome.
Please select the launcher you want to use:
Update found, would you like to download?
MiHome has new version, click to install

"Q1: #bs#Why can’t some lockscreens display normally?#be# #br# A1: The most common reason is that the lockscreen theme does not support the resolution of your phone. Most lockscreen themes of Milocker are created by MIUI fans and they are free for everyone. The theme makers usually test their works only on a few devices, so some themes may not fit your phone resolution. You may download those themes that fit your phone's resolution. #br# A2. There is also another possible reason. The image resources of some complex themes are so large that some devices may not be able to provide enough memory for them. If this is the case, you may use the simple themes. #br# #br# Q2: #bs#The lockscreen password doesn’t work, why?#be# #br# A: For some reasons, non-system lockscreen can be bypassed by long press on the power button and home key. So password is not supported for now. #br# #br# Q3: #bs#Why does the system lockscreen display after reboot?#be# #br# A: This is subject to the restrictions of Android system. You need to use the native lockscreen for the first boot; otherwise the lockscreen will not work correctly in some cases. #br# #br# Q4: #bs#I press the power button twice in rapid succession, but the screen doesn’t lock, why?#be# #br# A: If your press interval is shorter than a certain time, the lockscreen will not start. #br# #br# Q5: #bs#The wallpaper of some lockscreen themes can’t be changed, why?#be# #br# A: This is determined by the theme maker. Perhaps for the aesthetic and other considerations, some theme makers use a fixed background image which cannot be changed. #br# #br# Q6: #bs#Why is text shown on the lockscreen in different languages?#be# #br# A: It depends on the theme maker. Maybe the theme you choose is created by a maker in other countries. You may select the appropriate language version of the theme package, or you can modify the language by yourself. #br# #br# Q7: #bs#Some lockscreen themes can bring up the music player interface, but some cannot, why?#be# #br# A: Music playback controls need to be supported by the theme. Some themes may not have music playback function. Please download a theme with the function. #br# #br# Q8: #bs#Some theme preview displays the weather, why the weather does not appear on my phone?#be# #br# A: You need to install the weather app, please check #as# href=http://www.miui.com/thread-335430-1-1.html>here#ae# for specific methods. #br# #br# Q9: #bs#How to put lockscreen themes downloaded on the computer into my phone?#be# #br# A: Please copy them into to the directory of sdcard / MIUI / theme. #br# #br# Q10: #bs#Why can’t I uninstall Milocker successfully?#be# #br# A: You may have enabled one-key locker. Please go to Settings to turn it off before uninstalling. #br# #br# Q11: #bs#Why the showing homescreen effect is not working when I enable hiding statusbar?#be# #br# A: On Android 2.2 and certain devices(e.g. Samsung I9100) the showing homescreen effect will be disabled while hiding statusbar is enabled. #br# #br# Q12: #bs#Why one-key locker or system lockscreen password not working?#be# #br# A1: Perhaps the Rom you are using modifies some features of the stock Android system, such as MEB525 + and other devices. You may try to flash another Rom. A2: MiLocker only supports the pattern password of system lockscreen under android 4.0. #br#"
1. Improve stability, efficiency and optimize memory consumption. #br#
Enabling it can perform one-key locker and make locking automatically perfect after lighting up the screen

"You have enabled one-key locker. If you want to uninstall Milocker, please turn off one-key locker first, otherwise you cannot uninstall it successfully.
Attention: one-key locker may not work on some device, see FAQ12."
Apply for permission to lock screen
You must active this permission to use one-key locker
Please active one-key locker in settings of MiHome
MiLocker has detected that your had enabled system lockscreen password, for safety please finish the lock home key operation to activate password checking.
MiLocker only supports pattern password for now, please choose pattern password of lockscreen in system settings.
You need to install OneKey Locker to enable Locker Shortcut, are you sure to continue?
You need to install OneKey Locker to enable Locker Shortcut

The format of the local themes need to be converted to enhance efficiency. It could take a moment to update and the phone response rate maybe affected. Convert themes now?
